sentences.english: Analysis about some phenomenon of using characters of bronze inscriptions in the Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 分析讨论汉代金文中的用字研究。

sentences.english: The Hepu Tombs, from the Han Dynasty, are in Guangxi province.
sentences.chinese: 汉代的合浦陵园在广西省境内。

sentences.english: Xinjiang Karez back in the Han Dynasty two thousand years ago, there were problems of its shape.
sentences.chinese: 新疆的坎儿井早在两千年前的汉代即出现其雏形。

sentences.english: This collection is an excellent example to show artistic style of Han bronze seals.
sentences.chinese: 从这些古印中可窥测到汉代铜印艺术特色与风格。

sentences.english: The origin of the military finance in the Han Dynasty can trace back to the Zhou Dynasty, and it consummated in the Qin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 汉代军事财政的渊源可溯及到周朝，至秦已比较完善。

sentences.english: It is an important feature of poetic viewpoints of the Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 重视诗歌的讽谏功能，是汉代诗学的重要特点。

sentences.english: During the Han Dynasty, perfect dance with fish stage props was found .
sentences.chinese: 至汉代已有较完美的持鱼道具而舞的形式。

sentences.english: The Mai Jing or Pulse Classic was written in the late Han dynasty by Wang Shu-he.
sentences.chinese: 在麦击嗯或脉冲经典写后期由汪属汉代河。

sentences.english: Large dark green lanes, there are gray stone miscellaneous flaws, resulting in the Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 大体呈墨绿，杂有灰白石瑕，产生于汉代。

sentences.english: Taixue was very important to the political control and the development of culture in the Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 太学对汉代的政治统治和文化发展起了重大作用。

sentences.english: This section points out the astrology flourished during the Han Dynasty various social causes.
sentences.chinese: 这一部分分析了星占学在汉代兴盛的各种社会原因。

sentences.english: Palace women were a special womans colony in the society in Han dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 汉代宫廷女性是社会中一个特殊的女性群体。

sentences.english: The second point is that the system changes redquin destiny view of Han people and music system in the comments.
sentences.chinese: 二为汉代人天命观和礼乐制度的变化在注解中的体现。

sentences.english: Art of portrayal bricks have been to the peak early in the development of the Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 画像砖艺术早在汉代就已经发展到了高峰。

sentences.english: No record is found in the Han Dynasty documentation of Mencius' style.
sentences.chinese: 孟子之字，在汉代文献均说未闻。

sentences.english: In Han Dynasty, elite class included merchant elite and township elites.
sentences.chinese: 汉代豪民在类型上可大致划分为工商豪民和乡里豪民。

definition: Western Han Dynasty (206 BC-8 AD), also called 前漢|前汉[Qian2 Han4], Former Han Dynasty
Qin dynasty (221-207 BC), founded by the first emperor Qin Shihuang 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2], the first dynasty to rule the whole of China
Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)/refers to the Western Han and Eastern Han
pre-Qin, Chinese history up to the foundation of the Qin imperial dynasty in 221 BC
the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods
Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties/generic term for historic period 220-589 between Han and Sui
the Qin (221-207 BC) and Han (206 BC-220 AD) dynasties
